title: Airport Check-in

stages.name: Check-in Counter
stages.ai_opening: Good morning! May I see your passport and booking confirmation?
stages.learning_tip: 예약 확인서는 booking confirmation, 여권은 passport
suggested_responses: I booked online, here's my reference number.

stages.name: Baggage
stages.ai_prompt: Ask about baggage and check bags
stages.learning_tip: 위탁 수하물은 checked baggage, 기내 반입은 carry-on
suggested_responses: I have one bag to check.
Is my carry-on within the size limit?
I have a connecting flight. Will my bag go through?

stages.name: Seat Selection
stages.learning_tip: 창가는 window seat, 복도는 aisle seat
suggested_responses: Can I have a window seat?
Do you have any aisle seats available?
I'd like to sit near the front.

stages.name: Gate Information
stages.ai_prompt: Provide boarding pass and gate information
stages.learning_tip: 탑승구는 gate, 탑승 시간은 boarding time
suggested_responses: What gate do I go to?

completion_message: Great job completing the Airport Check-in scenario!
